pullrequest.title: Fixed typo in color argument of QColor in on_shot_selection_changed.

content.raw:
Looks like PyQt corrected a bug in v4.11.4 (see [here](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/32983668/pyqt4-4-11-4-no-longer-accepts-qbrushnone-or-qcolornone)) which stops you calling `QColor(None)`

The bug in our code was then exposed by this, because the resampling algorithm typically sets the colour very shortly after our mistake anyway, so you didn't notice the incorrect colour.
content.html:
Looks like PyQt corrected a bug in v4.11.4 (see here) which stops you calling QColor(None)

The bug in our code was then exposed by this, because the resampling algorithm typically sets the colour very shortly after our mistake anyway, so you didn't notice the incorrect colour.
